page.title: 10The Industrial Estate
page.content: SAAB have been in{Marlow}for 9 years. They used to be in Slough but chose {Marlow}because it ha good access to London and Heathrow straight down the M4. They had a few other towns under consideration when they moved. They employ 34 people in management, 31 clerical, 9 manual, 2 skilled manual, a total of 74 employees. They want to expand and stay in{Marlow}if they have a choice. The site is 50 000 square feet. They produce cars, lorries and planes but in{Marlow}they only market cars. They produce 112 000 cars a year. Saab sell most of their products to professional people. Saab stands for Svenska Aroplan Aktie Bolagat. There is one restaurant on the site and two conference rooms for the staff. Saab recruit clerical staff locally, but they bring people in for management from all over the country.
